name: Memory Management
description: Handles memory storage and retrieval using a SQLite database.
author: Shinkai

data.description: Text data to store in memory. If omitted, returns all stored memories. Supports any text format

general_prompt.description: Template for processing general/global memories. Optional - uses default if not provided

specific_prompt.description: Template for processing key-specific memories. Optional - uses default if not provided

key.description: Unique identifier to store/retrieve specific memories. Optional - uses general memory if omitted

generalMemory.description: Latest state of general/global memory after processing. Null if using specific memories

specificMemory.description: Latest state of key-specific memory after processing. Null if using general memory

sqlTables.name: memory_table
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS memory_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, date DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, key TEXT, memory TEXT)

sqlQueries.name: Get general memory
sqlQueries.query: SELECT id, key, memory FROM memory_table WHERE key IS NULL

sqlQueries.name: Get specific memory
sqlQueries.query: SELECT id, key, memory FROM memory_table WHERE key = ?

sqlQueries.name: Update memory
sqlQueries.query: UPDATE memory_table SET memory = ? WHERE id = ?
